title: Caddies File $50 Million Class-Action Lawsuit Against PGA Tour
teaser: More than 100 caddies filed legal action against the Professional Golfers Association for $50 million in advertising revenue. Renee Montagne talks to Rex Hoggard, a senior writer at the Golf Channel.
contentencoded: Copyright 2015 NPR. To see more, visit http://www.npr.org/.
